title: HTML
description: The foundational language for creating the structure of web pages, used to organize content and make it accessible.

title: CSS and Sass
description: Responsible for the layout, design, and overall presentation of the webpage. Sass makes it slightly less annoying to write.

title: JavaScript
description: The language that is used to program everything it wasn't intended to. Essential web development skill.

title: React
description: JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Makes front-end development fast and efficient.

title: Next.js
description: My JavaScript framework of choice. React with flexible server-side rendering as well as full stack capabilities.

title: Prisma
description: An ORM tool that simplifies database access with an easy-to-use API.

title: PostgreSQL
description: Powerful, open-source relational database system. Known for its reliability, scalability, and support for complex queries.
